import ReactGA from'react-ga4';const GA_MEASUREMENT_ID='G-HTS08BJ4HG';export const initGA=()=>{ReactGA.initialize(GA_MEASUREMENT_ID,{testMode:process.env.NODE_ENV==='test'});};export const trackPageView=path=>{ReactGA.send({hitType:'pageview',page:path});};export const trackEvent=(action,category,label,value)=>{ReactGA.event({action,category,label,value});};// Track specific business events
export const trackButtonClick=(buttonName,location)=>{trackEvent('click','Button',"".concat(buttonName," - ").concat(location));};export const trackFormSubmit=formName=>{trackEvent('submit','Form',formName);};export const trackConsultationClick=source=>{trackEvent('click','Consultation',source);};export const trackPricingView=packageName=>{trackEvent('view','Pricing',packageName);};export const trackBlogPostView=postTitle=>{trackEvent('view','Blog',postTitle);};export const trackCaseStudyView=studyTitle=>{trackEvent('view','Case Study',studyTitle);};
